languages.text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

languages.text: Esta arma inflige +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al objetivo por cada acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} que tenga.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma inflige +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al objetivo por cada acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} que tenga.

languages.text: この武器はターゲットに対し、そのターゲットが得ている{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}1スタックごとに、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}+{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}を与える。
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: この武器はターゲットに対し、そのターゲットが得ている{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}1スタックごとに、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>を与える。

languages.text: 这把武器命中目标时，目标每有一层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果，此次攻击就会额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器命中目标时，目标每有一层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果，此次攻击就会额外造成<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Diese Waffe fügt dem Ziel für jeden Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, mit dem es belegt ist, +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe fügt dem Ziel für jeden Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, mit dem es belegt ist, +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Cette arme inflige +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à la cible pour chaque cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} dont elle souffre.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme inflige +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CT{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à la cible pour chaque cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} dont elle souffre.

languages.text: Это оружие наносит {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}, наложенного на цель.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.

traits.locale_text: Это оружие наносит <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, наложенного на цель.

Это оружие наносит <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно за каждый уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, наложенного на цель.

languages.text: Bu silah, hedefin maruz kalmış olduğu her {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g} birikimi için ona +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.
